title: Respected Sir, I Arvinder Singh from ludhiana. I purchase Google pixel 5. I bought this phone from A
content:
Respected Sir,
I Arvinder Singh from ludhiana. I purchase Google pixel 5. I bought this phone from Amazon. The product Invoice number ( IN-4472 ). I order this product on 20 JAN 2021. Order number (402-9821776-3369936). I have issue with my phone. My problem is Pixel sound problem. I fase this issue two week ago.
I send the message in Google support for my issue. But nothing he should done. I request to replace my Google Pixel 5  phone.
